div.p: Treming has hands on experience in building native iOS applications for all of your needs. Our iOS application development expertise includes:

Many of our startup customers want to build a prototype so that they can pitch their
idea to investors. At Treming, we make sure your requirements are well
documented before we begin building the prototype iOS application to a level where
it can be demoed to an audience. Once you get funded, the existing prototype app
stack becomes the base for the entire development cycle. Since we are a software
house, we can take care of your backend web services needs as well. Working with
Treming gives you an expert team of iOS developers, creative designers with
experience in UI/UX design, quality assurance testers with access to the latest tools,
project managers and software design architects.

Each customer is different. In some cases, we are not dealing with a startup and the
established business has enough in their budget to get started on the development
of an iOS App. Our team will work closely with the customerâ€™s team to gather and
document the requirements for the application. Most of the initial meetings will be
over WebEx or Skype. We will start working on the actual iOS App
development once everyone agrees on the architecture of the solution and has
signed the project proposal. We will do the final work of submitting the app on the
iOS app store and work with Apple to get it approved quickly.

In most cases, we work on iOS projects on a fixed cost basis but you can also opt for
Time and Material or Full Time Staffing options.
